item.title: Enter?
item.dc:creator: @sonny_bill_9 ``jason
item.description:
@sonny_bill_9 wrote:

i dont know if there is one for 1.13 i started when 3.11 came out =P but you could use many things like:

SendKeys(chr(13))

or this if you are using SRL but i dont reccomend it

typesend('')

your one works too(you can take out the sleep part i doesnt need to be there so it looks like this:Keydown(13); Keyup(13);)
